titleStmt.title: A seasonable exhortation of sundry ministers in London to the people of their respective congregations.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by E.M. for Samuel Gellibrand at the golden Ball in Pauls Church-yard; and Robert Gibbs at the golden Ball in Chancery lane,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Edward Reynolds [and 61 others].
Parts of quires A and B are in two settings; A4r line 16 ends (1) "of Religion" or (2) "of Religion a-"; B2r line 3 ends (1) "darkness and dark-" or (2) "Darkness and Dark-".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 23. 1659"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the golden Ball in Chancery lane
the golden Ball in Pauls Church-yard;
